info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:26PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Passaic, Bergen, central Essex, southern Westchester, Bronx and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1225 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Caldwell, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yonkers, Paterson, Passaic, Bloomfield, Hackensack, Orange, Bergenfield, Paramus, Ridgewood, Lyndhurst, Rutherford, Ridgefield, Caldwell, Riverdale and Fort Lee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
